Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 761 Filed 08/10/22 Page 73 of 246 2368
LCGCmax2 Espinosa - direct
1 Q. Do you remember any of the names of the people who had regular apartments in that building, who regularly stayed there?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. Who were some of those people?
4 A. Jeffrey Epstein's pilots had apartments there. Jane stayed there, Jane's mother, Jane's brothers. We had -- let's see. There were some other executives that Jeffrey knew. Can't really recall other names. Shelly Lewis had an apartment there for a while.
5 Q. Who was Shelly Lewis?
6 A. Shelly was one of Jeffrey's friends, I guess.
7 Q. Okay. Do you know if Emmy Taylor ever had an apartment there?
8 A. Emmy Taylor had an apartment there.
9 (Continued on next page)
